item.description:
Ladies,

Margo Lynn and I are having a tea party and you are invited! 

Put on your party dress and your prettiest hat (and white gloves if you have them) and join us on Sunday for our "ladies only" low English tea. If you have a little lady she can come along with you just let me know.

If you would like to contribute a made-at-home dish to the tea party please let me know that as well, but it is not required. 

We will be serving tea, of course, some sherry, and lemonade. The menu is traditional low tea items that Margo Lynn and I will coordinate.

Please join us.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: A Ladies Tea Party
